Translations.Text: They non hear its hissing They enjoy abode ubi they get everything they desire forever
Major horror non injuria them angels receive them joyfully Hoc est tuus feria promised vos
Ut feria nos fold caelum folding book Just prout nos initiated primas creation nos repeat it Hoc est noster promise nos certainly carry it
Nos decretum Psalms alias prout in alius scriptures ut terra inherited My righteous worshipers
Hoc est proclamation people est worshipers
Nos sent vos mercy nos the whole saeculum
Proclaim ego dedit divine inspiration tuus deus est 1 deus! Vos tunc submit
they turn tunc dictus ego warned vos satis ego non habet idea quam soon late (retribution) advenit vos
He est fully aware de tuus public utterances He est fully aware de everything vos conceal
totus ego know hoc saeculum est test vos temporary enjoyment
Dictus My Dominus Tuus judgment est absolute justice Noster Dominus est the Multus Gracious; unus His help sought in the face de tuus claims
